creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Albert and Betty Elliott
description: assembled triptych: male figure in lower center holding out shallow, empty bowl in PR hand towards female character holding a blue ladle at LL; two female characters at male's PL side look toward male; red trees above; blue and red color scheme
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and colors on paper
title: Kabuki Actors
